game.title: Lost City Expedition
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifacts from the lost city and return them to the quest giver.
game.description: The lost city is hidden deep within the forest, and the path is guarded by deadly traps and fierce creatures. You must be careful and resourceful to succeed.
game.reward: 10 gold coins and a magical amulet

tasks.objective: Navigate through the forest without triggering any traps
tasks.description: Use your skills to avoid detection by the traps and reach the entrance of the lost city.

tasks.objective: Solve the puzzle to unlock the door
tasks.description: Use your knowledge of ancient languages and symbols to decipher the code and unlock the door.

tasks.objective: Retrieve the artifacts without triggering any alarms
tasks.description: Be quick and stealthy while retrieving the artifacts from their pedestals.
